title: Cellphones Do Not Give You Brain Cancer FiveThirtyEight » Science | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: Cellphones are increasingly globally ubiquitous. And like many technologies (for example, microwaves), their increased use has come with health concerns. Among the most prominent is that using cellphones can lead to brain tumors. Most recently, a paper from a team in Sweden has again concluded that the use of cellphones and cordless phones increases the […]
